title: Clarence Odbody

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, visit a player, you will heal them and grant them overprotective defense tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You can only protect each player once.

desc:
Post 4037
*Strange, isn't it? Each man's life touches so many other lives. When he isn't around he leaves an awful hole, doesn't he?*
